scripts.postinstall: npm -w Frontend1 i && ( [ -d backend1 ] && npm -w backend1 i || true )
scripts.dev: npm -w Frontend1 run dev || npm -w Frontend1 run start
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n web,api -c auto "npm -w Frontend1 run dev || npm -w Frontend1 run start" "npm -w backend1 run dev || npm -w backend1 start"
scripts.start: npm -w Frontend1 run start || npm -w Frontend1 run preview
